resources.string: "1.The goal of the game is to find all matching pairs of cards."
"2.You'll see a grid of face-down cards on the screen."
"3.Tap on any card to reveal its image."
"4.Tap on a second card to reveal its image as well."
"5.If the two revealed cards have the same image, they stay face up, and you've found a match!"
"6.If the two revealed cards have different images, they'll flip back face down after a moment, and you'll need to remember their positions."
"7.Remember: Pay attention to the images on the cards and their positions. This will help you find matching pairs."
"8.Continue:Keep flipping pairs of cards until all matches are found."
"9.Winning:The game is won when you've successfully matched all pairs, and all cards are face up."
"10.Try Again:If you want to play again, there's usually an option to restart the game."
"11.Enjoy: Have fun and enjoy playing the memory matching game!"
